comment_data.body:
If you want a short-term fix, I think it'll work if you split it into two lines:

```
names_tuple = tuple(self.stp.dim_names())
return tuple(frombytes(x) for x in names_tuple)
```

Should be fairly straightforward to fix in Cython though.

I also think there should be a `std::move` in `__pyx_cur_scope->__pyx_genexpr_arg_0 = __pyx_genexpr_arg_0;` although there might be a reason I didn't do that.
Thank you for the suggestion.  The workaround does work.  I don't think there will be a problem leaving it in so there is no rush to fix this issue on our account.

rename.from: [BUG] Generated code attempts to modify const vector
rename.to: [BUG] Generated code attempts to modify const field

milestone.description:
Goals:
– New version scheme: 3.x instead of 0.x.
– Change default `language_level` from `2` to `3str`.
– Change default for `binding` directive from `False` to `True`.
– Fix some Python compatibility issues (if possible, allowing for breaking changes).

title: [BUG] Generated code attempts to modify const field
